LSTM integration for natural language processing
Application of agile methodologies and SCRUM in development

Integração de múltiplas bibliotecas de visão computacional
Garantir acessibilidade para diferentes tipos de deficiência
results: Software funcional utilizado em ambiente acadêmico
Reconhecimento positivo por parte de usuários PWD

projects.name: Microservices Structure
projects.description: Base structure for microservices development with Docker and Python, frontend integration with Node.js and React. Support for data analysis and monitoring.

projects.name: Signature Recognizer
projects.description: Implementation of a signature similarity verification system using neural networks and Triplet Loss, focused on embeddings, biometric evaluation and the CEDAR dataset.
features: Pipeline from preprocessing to model evaluation
highlights: Deep learning model training with EfficientNet-B0 and Triplet Loss for signature verification
Processing and analysis of the challenging CEDAR dataset with genuine and forged signatures
Implementation of biometric evaluation metrics including ROC Curve and Equal Error Rate (EER)
Embedding generation and signature verification based on Euclidean distance
Complete pipeline from data preprocessing to model evaluation in Google Colab environment
challenges: Otimização de embeddings para alta precisão
results: Modelo funcional para verificação de assinaturas

Complete solution combining desktop application with web server functionality

projects.name: The Forca
projects.description: A modern and interactive reimagining of the classic Hangman game, available to play in your browser. This collaborative project combines a Python (FastAPI) backend with a Vanilla JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, and SCSS frontend for a fluid and engaging experience.

highlights: Collaborative project to modernize a classic command-line game into a full-stack web application.
Developed a RESTful API backend using FastAPI for clean separation of concerns.
Frontend built with Vanilla JavaScript, showcasing a deep understanding of core web technologies.
Implemented a modern, responsive design using Tailwind CSS and SCSS for a visually appealing user experience.
Focus on user experience with progressive feedback and an interactive virtual keyboard.
Clean, modular architecture with clear separation between frontend and backend components.
challenges: Migrating a CLI project to a web-based, full-stack architecture
Ensuring seamless communication between the Python backend and the JavaScript frontend
Managing real-time visual updates based on game state without a complex framework
results: Fully functional and deployed web game
Clear project documentation for easy contribution and understanding
Demonstration of full-stack development skills and collaborative project management
